SEARCH
Package com.fortisbank.business.services.account

Class AccountService

java.lang.Object
com.fortisbank.business.services.account.AccountService
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAccountService
public class AccountService extends Object implements IAccountService
AccountService manages account-related operations (CRUD) using the selected storage mode. This service is now focused solely on accounts and no longer handles transactions.
